trans-unit.source: A trigger action that pauses a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
Use a PauseStoryboard with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to pause a Storyboard.
trans-unit.target: 와 PauseStoryboard를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>를 스토리 보드를 일시 중지 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: PauseStoryboard only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).

To control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the PauseStoryboard must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls that <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: 에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> 를 제어 하</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> 는 PauseStoryboard 참조 해야 하는,</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> 제어 하려면

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: 참조 [하는 방법: 한 스토리 보드 후 시작을 제어 하려면 이벤트 트리거를 사용 하 여](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 예에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Beginning a Paused Animation When a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action is triggered after it has been paused, it appears to resume and restart.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지 된 애니메이션 하는 시점부터 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>것 같은 데 다시 시작 하 고 다시 시작, 일시 중지 된 후 동작이 트리거됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: That's not what actually happens, however: the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action actually replaces itself with an unpaused version.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 실제로 오버플로가 발생 하지 않습니다,:는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>동작 실제로으로 대체 하는 일시 중지 해제 버전.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: Each time a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action is triggered, clock objects are created for its storyboard.
trans-unit.target: 될 때마다 한 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>동작이 트리거됩니다, 스토리 보드에 대해 클록 개체가 만들어집니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate.
trans-unit.target: 애니메이션 효과 주는 속성에 이러한 clock 배포 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: So, when a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is triggered again, it doesn't restart its clocks, it replaces them with new clocks.
trans-unit.target: 그럴 경우에는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>트리거되는 다시 해당 시계를 다시 시작 되지 않는, 새 시계와 대체.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard"></xref> class.
